Text: Tracy ETS presentation is attached as requested My monitor is on the blink today so I am sending from someone elses computer Scott

New Member to EOL GroupAll Please add Stephanie Sever to all EOL emails that you currently send to Frank Davis and myself I am leaving the group as of June st and she will be taking over my responsibilities However please continue to send them to me until then Thank you Lisa Gillette x

No longer with EOL Product Control Cc Everyone Just wanted to inform you that I am leaving EnronOnline Operations as of June st Please take my name off of your email distribution lists effective immediately Stephanie Sever will be taking over my responsibilities and handling all relevant issues I have enjoyed working with you all Thank you Lisa Gillette

Re No longer with EOL Product Controlmoving into Bob Shults group with EnronOnline Marketing So I am not moving too far actually I am still going to be sitting at my current desk From Tana Jones on AM To Lisa CT cc Subject Re No longer with EOL Product Control Where are you going Lisa Gillette AM To Tom CT Debbie R CT Brant CT Tana CT Karen CT Anthony CT Samuel CT Leslie CT Susan CT Susan CT cc EOL Call Center Subject No longer with EOL Product Control Hello Everyone Just wanted to inform you that I am leaving EnronOnline Operations as of June st Please take my name off of your email distribution lists effective immediately Stephanie Sever will be taking over my responsibilities and handling all relevant issues I have enjoyed working with you all Thank you Lisa Gillette

Re No longer with EOL Product Controlbet I knew there would be benefits coming from Product Control I can go directly to the source for information From Tana Jones on AM To Lisa CT cc Subject Re No longer with EOL Product Control So I guess Ill be hearing from you when you need Confidentiality Agreements So well still get to work together Lisa Gillette AM To Tana CT cc Subject Re No longer with EOL Product Control I moving into Bob Shults group with EnronOnline Marketing So I am not moving too far actually I am still going to be sitting at my current desk From Tana Jones on AM To Lisa CT cc Subject Re No longer with EOL Product Control Where are you going Lisa Gillette AM To Tom CT Debbie R CT Brant CT Tana CT Karen CT Anthony CT Samuel CT Leslie CT Susan CT Susan CT cc EOL Call Center Subject No longer with EOL Product Control Hello Everyone Just wanted to inform you that I am leaving EnronOnline Operations as of June st Please take my name off of your email distribution lists effective immediately Stephanie Sever will be taking over my responsibilities and handling all relevant issues I have enjoyed working with you all Thank you Lisa Gillette

Thank Youwanted to let you all know how much I appreciated you coming to speak to our group this morning You provided great information and everyone said that your presentations were extremely insightful I am glad to see that we will continue to work together Lisa

EnronOnline CD Cc All We are putting together an interactive CD for use by new and existing Enron employees who would like to know more about EnronOnline and how our groups work together from start to finish Attached are the topics that are to be covered by each of your respective groups The items in bold denote the main points that users will be able to click on The items indented below each of these is what needs to have a script Please keep in mind that all information should be viewed from the customer perspective For example if a customer or someone new to Enron were to ask about a specific bolded topic how would you answer it Please limit your script to minutes and if you feel something pertinent has been left out please add it with the understanding that it may not make it to the final draft We have a very limited time frame in which to complete this task so please email me your scripts and cc Daniel Diamond by end of day Friday June If you have any questions please contact me at the extension below I will be out on Friday and Dan will be sending the scripts on Thank you in advance for your time and help Lisa Gillette x

EnronOnline CD Cc All We are putting together an interactive CD for use by new and existing Enron employees who would like to know more about EnronOnline and how our groups work together from start to finish Attached are the topics that are to be covered by each of your respective groups The items in bold denote the main points that users will be able to click on The items indented below each of these is what needs to have a script Please keep in mind that all information should be viewed from the customer perspective For example if a customer or someone new to Enron were to ask about a specific bolded topic how would you answer it Please limit your script to minutes and if you feel something pertinent has been left out please add it with the understanding that it may not make it to the final draft We have a very limited time frame in which to complete this task so please email me your scripts and cc Daniel Diamond by end of day Friday June If you have any questions please contact me at the extension below I will be out on Friday and Dan will be sending the scripts on Thank you in advance for your time and help Lisa Gillette x

RE FW Happy Hour Tonightjust came in early to catch up i was out half day friday and all day yesterday i am up for whatever but i dont want to get totally trashed on thursday and not be able to go out friday or saturday dc is such a great city i could definitely live there my friend works for the Speaker of the House so saturday he took me to the capitol and i got to see the speakers office and his private balcony that overlooks the washington monument and a lot of other offices and rooms that are offlimits to the public the weather was unbelievable during the day not a cloud in the sky high of and at night it was awesome we went out in georgetown friday and saturday matt you would totally love this place there was about bars outdoors right on the Potomac with Watergate in the background and this huge fountain we should all take a trip there for a weekend or boston thats the next place i want to go i need to move out of this city but then i would miss all of yall so anyway what are we doing this weekend Original Message From Lenhart Matthew Sent Tuesday May AM To Gillette Lisa Subject RE FW Happy Hour Tonight what are you doing at work so early i am already pumped to go out this weekend fri was bad for susan and eric they were the only one doing shots everyone else was fairly sober and just hanging out it was pretty discusting lets hit the town this weekend maybe even thurs how was dc i heard that place is a blast

RE FW Happy Hour Tonightkind of books are you looking to read the line was this those pants are making me hungry and unfortunately my witty comeback came the next morning when i remembered the dipshit telling me this too little too late it would have been nice to embarrass him in front of his friends i hope i dont need to tell you not to use this Original Message From Lenhart Matthew Sent Tuesday May AM To Gillette Lisa Subject RE FW Happy Hour Tonight what is it i got to know i need some new chicks i need the weekend today totally sucks what are some good books to read
Tomorrowany plans for tomorrow I vaguely remember you suggesting we hit the town tomorrow

RE Tomorrowyou partying this week already with Shawn Original Message From Lenhart Matthew Sent Wednesday May PM To Gillette Lisa Subject Re Tomorrow that was a mistake i dont know what i was thinking i need to stay home

RE Happy Houryou answer my question are you going with brokers hot date speaking of which how did things go on tuesday Original Message From Lenhart Matthew Sent Friday May AM To Gillette Lisa Subject RE Happy Hour everyone who is anyone will be there

Thank YouHi All Just wanted to take a minute to thank each of you for celebrating my birthday with me I was in a bit of a mood yesterday but dinner with all of you last night really helped me to enjoy the day Thanks so much Lisa
TonightHey I talked to Bryan and Shanna and they thought you all might be going out after dinner If yall do give me a call I may or may not go but let me know
Hi Sweetiehow are you doing baby just wanted to make sure your day was going well

RE Hi Sweetieyou have missed me havent you arent you glad that we were able to see past our differences and continue building our relationship Original Message From Lenhart Matthew Sent Monday June PM To Gillette Lisa Subject RE Hi Sweetie oh it is going great so great to hear from you how is everything at the top of the building Original Message From Gillette Lisa Sent Monday June PM To Lenhart Matthew Subject Hi Sweetie how are you doing baby just wanted to make sure your day was going well

Re Annual Christmas Dinner Cc th or the nd works for me As far as restaurants go I think we should try a place that hasnt been blessed with our presence My vote is for Benjis see you girls soon hope all is well lisa Laura Jahnke on PM Please respond to To Susan Edwards Ash Mace Katy Hester Emily Hillegeist Corinne ellcom Corinne ellcom Laura White tageStorescom indspring cc Subject Annual Christmas Dinner Hi Girls Its that time again We need to get everyone together for our annual Christmas Dinner I have spoken to many of you and tried to come up with a good time for everyone Unfortunately there doesnt seem to be a perfect day but how about FridayDec nd Please respond and tell me what you think I have had a few suggestions for a placeChurrascos Americas Ruggles Benjis Sullivansplease send a suggestion Dont say it doesnt matter because majority vote will win and there will be no recount The time will probably be around pm I know the nd is close to Christmas so the th has also been suggestedbut I am afraid not everyone will be in town yet Please send me your thoughts on the day restauraunt and if we should plan something after dinner I cant wait to see everyone and hope all can make it Laura

Fwd FW the hand of hopeForwarded by Lisa GilletteHOUECT on PM Priya NRON PM To Jayshree CT cc Lisa CT Subject Fwd FW the hand of hope Thought you might like this Dr Desai A picture began circulating in November In many peoples opinions it should be proclaimed as The Picture of the Year or perhaps The Picture of the Decade The picture is that of a weekold unborn baby named Samuel Alexander Armas who is being operated on by a surgeon named Joseph Bruner The baby was diagnosed with Spina Bifida and would not Survive if removed from the mothers womb Little Samuels motherJulie Armas is an obstetrics nurse in Atlanta She knew of Dr Bruners remarkable surgical procedure Practicing at Vanderbilt University Medical Center in Nashville he performs these special operations while the baby is still in the womb In the procedure a Csection removes the uterus and the doctor makes a small incision to operate on the baby During the surgery on little Samuel the little guy reached his tiny but fully developed hand through the incision and firmly grasped the surgeons finger The photograph captures this amazing event with perfect clarity The editors titled the picture Hand of Hope The text explaining the picture begins The tiny hand of weekold fetus Samuel Alexander Armas emerges from the mothers uterus to grasp the finger of DrJoseph Bruner as if thanking the doctor for the gift life You can see the actual picture Heres the website bighandgif bighandgif Get more from the Web FREE MSN Explorer download

Re Christmas Dinner Cc we would all be extremely disappointed if you didnt kasey walker now where is that school pride Kasey Walker on PM To Susan Edwards Ash Mace Katy Hester Emily Hillegeist Laura White tageStorescom Corinne ellcom cc Subject Re Christmas Dinner Sounds great Can I wear my CCC letter jacket Kasey Original Message From Laura Jahnke To Susan Edwards Ash Mace Katy Hester Emily Hillegeist Kasey Walker Laura White tageStorescom Corinne ellcom Sent Tuesday December AM Subject Christmas Dinner Girls Thank you for the responses So far it has been overwhelmingly positive I really cant wait to get us all together Emily had suggested Ousiess Tableas well as a coworker of mine Yesterday during our lunch break we went and looked at Ousiess and it seems pretty cute Unfortunately they were not open but I heard they light it up at night and it is supposed to be really pretty The other suggestion is Benjis Lisyou made a good point It would be nice to try somewhere new I have not heard from Sarah or Kellyso if you talk to themplease pass them the message I know Kelly usually checks her email but I am not sure about Sarah If anyone has a number for herlet me know I also havent heard from Susan Scottso Lisa you are in charge of that AshleyI know youve gotten this messageso reply CorinneSorry that you will not be able to make it If anything changeslet us know Jens flight comes in around that nightso I thought we would make the reservations for so she has time to make it Let me know what yall think Laura
Re Christmas Dinner Cc t get in until midnight on the nd so unless we can change it to the rd she wont be able to attend

Re Annual Christmas Dinner Cc truly up for either of the suggestions emily made i just dont want to go some place that we have already been for this particular excursion Emily Hillegeist on AM To Corinne ellcom tageStorescom cc Subject Re Annual Christmas Dinner my vote is for the nd there is a good chance that if we were to plan this business on the th we would need to bring a cot for me since approx pm will still be feeling like waaaaay past my bedtime and NO ONE wants me to be subdued do they ok dont answer that who else will take it upon themselves to be embarassingly drunk perhaps vomiting on the curbexcept laura oh wait thats the trash can just kidding laura couldnt resist plus it was nice to have a partner in crimejen kk other spectacular vomiters you are included as well you nonhangover happygolucky at am people make me sickliterally god am i rambling a little loopy too many papers too little time i was also going to throw out las alamedas as a suggestion or ousiess table any thoughts i dont think ANY of us have been there for grp thingscant wait to see everyone e From Laura Jahnke ReplyTo To Susan Edwards Ash Mace Katy Hester Emily Hillegeist Corinne ellcom Laura White indspring Subject Annual Christmas Dinner Date Fri Dec Hi Girls Its that time again We need to get everyone together for our annual Christmas Dinner I have spoken to many of you and tried to come up with a good time for everyone Unfortunately there doesnt seem to be a perfect day but how about FridayDec nd Please respond and tell me what you think I have had a few suggestions for a placeChurrascos Americas Ruggles Benjis Sullivansplease send a suggestion Dont say it doesnt matter because majority vote will win and there will be no recount The time will probably be around pm I know the nd is close to Christmas so the th has also been suggestedbut I am afraid not everyone will be in town yet Please send me your thoughts on the day restauraunt and if we should plan something after dinner I cant wait to see everyone and hope all can make it Laura Get more from the Web FREE MSN Explorer download

Just wanted to sayForwarded by Lisa GilletteHOUECT on AM elderjm vanderbiltedu on PM To cc Subject Just wanted to say it was great meeting you Saturday To think this all started with a tip for the guitar player I hope the rest of the night went well for you Hopefully you all and especially the bridetobe had a great time I just flew in a little bit ago I caught an earlier flight out of Dallas around I was supposed to fly out at but had nothing to do at the job fair and was forced to check out of my room by So instead of wasting my whole day in the hotel lobby I decided to fly standby I just have to say that it sucks that we were both still in Dallas today and I had no way of getting in touch with you It would have been nice to see you again Hopefully Ill get another chance In all the dancing and drinking I completely forgot to close out my tab last night Translation my credit card is still at Have a Nice Day Cafe Great huh Thanks a lotI blame you for distracting me If I hadnt met you Id probably be sitting here with my credit card in my wallet I hope you know Im just kidding Credit cards are replaceable Its not the first time Ive lost one and unfortunately probably wont be the last Hey I dont want you to think Im just the typical guy you meet in a bar Im not In all honesty Im as far from that as a guy can get Everything I told you Saturday night is true so please dont think I was telling you lines just to hook up with you Im hope you realize that Once again it was truly a pleasure meeting you I dont remember if I gave you my info You now have my email address and my phone numbers are H and C however I dont expect you to call Ill call you Having three older sisters teaches a guy that he needs to be the initiator so Ill give you a call in the next couple of days Until then Ill be thinking about you If you have a chance to email it would be great to hear from you Hope you had a safe trip back to Houston Talk to you soon John

Fwd FW the hand of hopeForwarded by Lisa GilletteHOUECT on PM Priya NRON PM To Jayshree CT cc Lisa CT Subject Fwd FW the hand of hope Thought you might like this Dr Desai A picture began circulating in November In many peoples opinions it should be proclaimed as The Picture of the Year or perhaps The Picture of the Decade The picture is that of a weekold unborn baby named Samuel Alexander Armas who is being operated on by a surgeon named Joseph Bruner The baby was diagnosed with Spina Bifida and would not Survive if removed from the mothers womb Little Samuels motherJulie Armas is an obstetrics nurse in Atlanta She knew of Dr Bruners remarkable surgical procedure Practicing at Vanderbilt University Medical Center in Nashville he performs these special operations while the baby is still in the womb In the procedure a Csection removes the uterus and the doctor makes a small incision to operate on the baby During the surgery on little Samuel the little guy reached his tiny but fully developed hand through the incision and firmly grasped the surgeons finger The photograph captures this amazing event with perfect clarity The editors titled the picture Hand of Hope The text explaining the picture begins The tiny hand of weekold fetus Samuel Alexander Armas emerges from the mothers uterus to grasp the finger of DrJoseph Bruner as if thanking the doctor for the gift life You can see the actual picture Heres the website bighandgif bighandgif Get more from the Web FREE MSN Explorer download

Just wanted to sayForwarded by Lisa GilletteHOUECT on AM elderjm vanderbiltedu on PM To cc Subject Just wanted to say it was great meeting you Saturday To think this all started with a tip for the guitar player I hope the rest of the night went well for you Hopefully you all and especially the bridetobe had a great time I just flew in a little bit ago I caught an earlier flight out of Dallas around I was supposed to fly out at but had nothing to do at the job fair and was forced to check out of my room by So instead of wasting my whole day in the hotel lobby I decided to fly standby I just have to say that it sucks that we were both still in Dallas today and I had no way of getting in touch with you It would have been nice to see you again Hopefully Ill get another chance In all the dancing and drinking I completely forgot to close out my tab last night Translation my credit card is still at Have a Nice Day Cafe Great huh Thanks a lotI blame you for distracting me If I hadnt met you Id probably be sitting here with my credit card in my wallet I hope you know Im just kidding Credit cards are replaceable Its not the first time Ive lost one and unfortunately probably wont be the last Hey I dont want you to think Im just the typical guy you meet in a bar Im not In all honesty Im as far from that as a guy can get Everything I told you Saturday night is true so please dont think I was telling you lines just to hook up with you Im hope you realize that Once again it was truly a pleasure meeting you I dont remember if I gave you my info You now have my email address and my phone numbers are H and C however I dont expect you to call Ill call you Having three older sisters teaches a guy that he needs to be the initiator so Ill give you a call in the next couple of days Until then Ill be thinking about you If you have a chance to email it would be great to hear from you Hope you had a safe trip back to Houston Talk to you soon John

Dinner SaturdayHi Girls Yvette and I were talking and thought it was about time to catch up with one another We were thinking about doing dinner Saturday night If interested please let one of us know Talk to you all soon

Saturday Night Cc Girls We are planning to meet at Yvettes Milford at I believe everyone recalls how to get there I have places in mind but please bring other suggestions I just figured none of us have been to either of these Baba Yega profile La Vista profile Heather email me and let me know if you would like me to pick up your tshirt for tomorrow for you Also we are supposed to be at the SSK House at am and it is right down the street from me so let me know if you would like to go together see you all soon lisa

Thank YouHi All Just wanted to take a minute to thank each of you for celebrating my birthday with me I was in a bit of a mood yesterday but dinner with all of you last night really helped me to enjoy the day Thanks so much Lisa

RE Thank Youthanks sue That actually sounds perfect I was really looking forward to an evening at home With the stock well on its way to i dont think there is anything IR can do to rectify the situation especially not tonightso I think I should be home by Cooking or Berryhills sounds great Actually lets cook as for what I dont know Any ideas Original Message From Scott Susan M Sent Wednesday October AM To Gillette Lisa Subject RE Thank You hey lis im sorry i was late last night and not in full party mode i too was in a bit of a mood anyway was going to see if you wanted anything special for dinner tonight i thought maybe i could cook something and that we could do presents etc while watching the ever popular felicity let me know how your day is looking and if there is anything i can preparepick up tonight that strikes your fancyid be happy to grab berryhill as well if that would hit the spot sue Happy Birthday again

Dallas to visit KatyI spoke to Katy last night and she mentioned that each of us had expressed interest in going to visit her in Dallas Right now Southwest has flights to Dallas for Would the of you be interested in taking a trip up there either the weekend of Nov or Nov Let me know because I am going to purchase a ticket for one of those weekends

RE Dallas to visit Katy Cc email Katy I think I am definitely in for the weekend of Nov Sue is a maybe and havent heard from Em yet So plan on at least one of us being there on Nov Original Message From Scott Susan M Sent Wednesday October PM To Gillette Lisa Subject RE Dallas to visit Katy i cant the weekend of the th bc of a Kbut maybe the rd Original Message From Gillette Lisa Sent Wednesday October PM To Scott Susan M Emily Email Subject Dallas to visit Katy I spoke to Katy last night and she mentioned that each of us had expressed interest in going to visit her in Dallas Right now Southwest has flights to Dallas for Would the of you be interested in taking a trip up there either the weekend of Nov or Nov Let me know because I am going to purchase a ticket for one of those weekends

Just wanted to sayForwarded by Lisa GilletteHOUECT on AM elderjm vanderbiltedu on PM To cc Subject Just wanted to say it was great meeting you Saturday To think this all started with a tip for the guitar player I hope the rest of the night went well for you Hopefully you all and especially the bridetobe had a great time I just flew in a little bit ago I caught an earlier flight out of Dallas around I was supposed to fly out at but had nothing to do at the job fair and was forced to check out of my room by So instead of wasting my whole day in the hotel lobby I decided to fly standby I just have to say that it sucks that we were both still in Dallas today and I had no way of getting in touch with you It would have been nice to see you again Hopefully Ill get another chance In all the dancing and drinking I completely forgot to close out my tab last night Translation my credit card is still at Have a Nice Day Cafe Great huh Thanks a lotI blame you for distracting me If I hadnt met you Id probably be sitting here with my credit card in my wallet I hope you know Im just kidding Credit cards are replaceable Its not the first time Ive lost one and unfortunately probably wont be the last Hey I dont want you to think Im just the typical guy you meet in a bar Im not In all honesty Im as far from that as a guy can get Everything I told you Saturday night is true so please dont think I was telling you lines just to hook up with you Im hope you realize that Once again it was truly a pleasure meeting you I dont remember if I gave you my info You now have my email address and my phone numbers are H and C however I dont expect you to call Ill call you Having three older sisters teaches a guy that he needs to be the initiator so Ill give you a call in the next couple of days Until then Ill be thinking about you If you have a chance to email it would be great to hear from you Hope you had a safe trip back to Houston Talk to you soon John

Re Annual Christmas Dinner Cc th or the nd works for me As far as restaurants go I think we should try a place that hasnt been blessed with our presence My vote is for Benjis see you girls soon hope all is well lisa Laura Jahnke on PM Please respond to To Susan Edwards Ash Mace Katy Hester Emily Hillegeist Corinne ellcom Corinne ellcom Laura White tageStorescom indspring cc Subject Annual Christmas Dinner Hi Girls Its that time again We need to get everyone together for our annual Christmas Dinner I have spoken to many of you and tried to come up with a good time for everyone Unfortunately there doesnt seem to be a perfect day but how about FridayDec nd Please respond and tell me what you think I have had a few suggestions for a placeChurrascos Americas Ruggles Benjis Sullivansplease send a suggestion Dont say it doesnt matter because majority vote will win and there will be no recount The time will probably be around pm I know the nd is close to Christmas so the th has also been suggestedbut I am afraid not everyone will be in town yet Please send me your thoughts on the day restauraunt and if we should plan something after dinner I cant wait to see everyone and hope all can make it Laura

Fwd FW the hand of hopeForwarded by Lisa GilletteHOUECT on PM Priya NRON PM To Jayshree CT cc Lisa CT Subject Fwd FW the hand of hope Thought you might like this Dr Desai A picture began circulating in November In many peoples opinions it should be proclaimed as The Picture of the Year or perhaps The Picture of the Decade The picture is that of a weekold unborn baby named Samuel Alexander Armas who is being operated on by a surgeon named Joseph Bruner The baby was diagnosed with Spina Bifida and would not Survive if removed from the mothers womb Little Samuels motherJulie Armas is an obstetrics nurse in Atlanta She knew of Dr Bruners remarkable surgical procedure Practicing at Vanderbilt University Medical Center in Nashville he performs these special operations while the baby is still in the womb In the procedure a Csection removes the uterus and the doctor makes a small incision to operate on the baby During the surgery on little Samuel the little guy reached his tiny but fully developed hand through the incision and firmly grasped the surgeons finger The photograph captures this amazing event with perfect clarity The editors titled the picture Hand of Hope The text explaining the picture begins The tiny hand of weekold fetus Samuel Alexander Armas emerges from the mothers uterus to grasp the finger of DrJoseph Bruner as if thanking the doctor for the gift life You can see the actual picture Heres the website bighandgif bighandgif Get more from the Web FREE MSN Explorer download
